quotes.quote: Wherever life plants you, bloom with grace.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: A journey of a thousand leagues begins beneath one’s feet.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Do not let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.
quotes.author: Jimmy Johnson

quotes.quote: Nothing can dim the light that shines from within.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: You can't go back and change the beginning, but you can start where you are and change the ending.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: I haven’t failed. I’ve just found 10,000 ways that won’t work.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: One day or day one. It's your decision.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: If you don't like the road you're walking, start paving another one.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: Two roads diverged in a wood, and I—I took the one less traveled by, And that has made all the difference.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Small steps in the right direction can turn out to be the biggest step of your life.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: No one is you and that is your superpower.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: I've failed over and over and over again in my life and that is why I succeed.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: The best time for new beginnings is now.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Life is a series of baby steps.
quotes.author: Hoda Kotb

quotes.quote: Every day may not be good, but there is something good in every day.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
The greatest discovery of all time is that a person can change his future by merely changing his attitude.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfreys

quotes.quote: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
quotes.author: Colin R. Davis

quotes.quote: Remember no one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: In three words I can sum up everything I’ve learned about life: It goes on.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: The person who says it cannot be done should not interrupt the person who is doing it.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Imagination is everything. It is the preview of life’s coming attractions.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent

quotes.quote: How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.
quotes.author: Anne Frank
